channel.title: Dadmother - 3 AM (chill WIP)
channel.description:
Just started working on this. Chill with a lot of ambience, and overall very relaxing to make thus far! This is in no way near a finished product and serves to display the musical and structural ideas for the track as of now. Feedback is welcome!
https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/3-am-update-wip/s-XZXTC *Edit: updated with some minor leveling/automation changes

item.title: Dadmother - 3 AM (chill WIP)

item.description:
Droppin’ knowledge

item.title: Dadmother - 3 AM (chill WIP)
item.dc:creator: Tolberto
item.description:
sine is very thin (the old tv sound bleep/emergency broadcast sound), saw is very buzzy, and square is bright and video-game-y

Read full topic

item.title: Dadmother - 3 AM (chill WIP)
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Thanks, bud! I appreciate them dang ol’ kind words. I’ll admit, I’m pretty ignorant to lead shape jargon (square, triangle, sawtooth etc.), but I plan on educating myself on the subject I understand the shapes themselves as waveforms, but I guess I’ve never thought about how they SOUND.

Read full topic

item.title: Dadmother - 3 AM (chill WIP)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Nice, diggin the vibe so far, very laid back. Would like to hear maybe a filtered square lead over the top? Nice guitars toward the end!

Read full topic
